properties.areaDesc: Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 4 at 8:11PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM
excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas...

At 810 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated showers, capable of producing
winds to around 30 knots. These showers were located along a line
extending from 55 nm east of Lauderdale-By-The-Sea to 30 nm east of
Floyd's Wall Northeast, moving southeast at 25 knots.
properties.instruction:
These showers will likely produce winds to around 30 knots, and could
pose a serious hazard for boaters. A special marine warning may
eventually be required for these storms. Boaters should consider
heading for shore before these storms arrive.

Waterspouts are possible with this activity. Remain on the alert in
case warnings are issued for waterspout development.

NWSheadline: STRONG SHOWERS OVER THE OFFSHORE ATLANTIC WATERS
